mapper.select: SELECT DEPT_ID as deptId, DEPT_NAME as deptName, CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM HR_DEPARTMENT TMP WHERE TMP.ORG_LEVEL_ID=deptId)=0 then 'false' else 'true' END AS isParent,'/gobal/img/org/dept.png' AS icon FROM HR_DEPARTMENT WHERE ORG_LEVEL_ID=#{orgLevelId} AND ORG_ID=#{orgId} ORDER BY SORT_NO ASC
